items.sentence: Tom realized right away that he should've worn a heavier coat.
Tom didn't find out about that until the day before yesterday.
Tom's neighbor will take care of his children while he's away.
Since everything was free, Tom ate and drank as much he could.
I couldn't catch the dog even though I ran as fast as I could.
That gift shop over there was built out of recycled materials.
The countries concerned settled the dispute by peaceful means.
Tom said that he's looking forward to spending time with Mary.
Tom hopes that he doesn't become a workaholic like his father.
Tom hoped that Mary wouldn't find out about what had happened.
